paramInformation.label: Synchronization Cool and Heat Temperature Set-Point
paramInformation.description: Synchronization cool and heat temperature set-point while one of it has been change by master controller

paramInformation.label: Inner Master Mcu Communication Address
paramInformation.description: Should same as inner master mcu configuration

metadata.inclusion: Press the PB button on the back side 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The LED will flash during inclusion.
metadata.exclusion: Press the PB button on the back side 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The LED will flash during exclusion.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the PB button on the back side for 10 seconds.
